newsitem.title: GERMANY: Primakov to brief Kinkel in Bonn on summit.
newsitem.headline: Primakov to brief Kinkel in Bonn on summit.

text.p: Russian Foreign Minister Yevgeny Primakov will visit Bonn next week to brief Germany on the results of the Helsinki summit, the German Foreign Ministry said on Friday.

Primakov will meet his German counterpart Klaus Kinkel on Saturday March 29 to discuss the summit between Russian President Boris Yeltsin and U.S. President Bill Clinton, spokesman Martin Erdmann told reporters.
The two men will also discuss work on the planned charter between NATO and Russia and the admission of new members to the alliance, he said.
The ministers will hold a news conference on Saturday.
